channel.title: Tiktok on CAMGDP: Central Asia and Mongolia Gender Data Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Tiktok on CAMGDP: Central Asia and Mongolia Gender Data Portal

item.title: Factcheck.kz
item.description: Founded in 2017, Factcheck.kz is a publication focuses on fact checking news and viral media. Available on Instagram, Telegram, TikTok, and YouTube.

item.title: Fading.TSE
item.description: Fading.TSE is a grassroots project documenting urban history of Kazakhstan and its capital. Primary focused on photography, oral histories, and cultural heritage. Available in Kazakh and Russian on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and Telegram.

item.title: Til Kespek Joq
item.description: Founded in 2020, Til Kespek Joq offers coverage of current events in Kazakhstan. Available in Kazakh on Instagram, Telegram, Twitter, Facebook, TikTok, and YouTube.
